name: 茧甲虫
description: 完全静止的茧形态，外壳坚硬如钢。内部正在进行神秘的蜕变，偶尔会微微发光。

image_prompts.design: A golden chrysalis with intricate patterns on its hard shell. Light occasionally glows through the cracks. Low poly style with faceted geometric surfaces, sharp edges on shell segments, ink sketch texture on intricate patterns, non-reflective surface with matte gold tones, mysterious and dormant.
